an3.6:4.3: Akusalena kāyakammena, akusalena vacīkammena, akusalena manokammena.
an3.6:4.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo.
an3.6:5.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo.
an3.6:5.3: Kusalena kāyakammena, kusalena vacīkammena, kusalena manokammena.
an3.6:5.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo.
